description: Try our easy to follow Pancakes With Caramelised Banana & Maple Syrup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pancakes With Caramelised Banana & Maple Syrup
name: Pancakes With Caramelised Banana & Maple Syrup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut bananas into long diagonal slices. Melt extra butter with sugar and maple syrup in a frying pan. Bring to simmer, add banana and cook for 2 minutes each side or until golden. Simmer for 2 minutes. Serve pancakes topped with banana and caramel sauce. Sprinkle with pecans.
